Fonts

These are notes associated with this fonts atoms.

primary-font: 'Karla', sans-serif
primary-font bold: 'Karla', sans-serif
primary-font italic: 'Karla', sans-serif
secondary-font: 'Nunito', sans-serif
secondary-font bold: 'Nunito', sans-serif
secondary-font italic: 'Nunito', sans-serif
<span class="primary-font">primary-font: &#x27;Karla&#x27;, sans-serif</span><br/>
<span class="primary-font bold">primary-font bold: &#x27;Karla&#x27;, sans-serif</span><br/>
<span class="primary-font italic">primary-font italic: &#x27;Karla&#x27;, sans-serif</span><br/>
<span class="secondary-font">secondary-font: &#x27;Nunito&#x27;, sans-serif</span><br/>
<span class="secondary-font bold">secondary-font bold: &#x27;Nunito&#x27;, sans-serif</span><br/>
<span class="secondary-font italic">secondary-font italic: &#x27;Nunito&#x27;, sans-serif</span><br/>

Typography

These are notes associated with this typography atoms. The only problem with doing a css reset is it also resets all the margin and padding of all typography. This renders all texts to not have separation spaces and is not good in the long run. Consider not using the reset html css and just eliminate the padding and margin of individual styled elements.

Heading Level 1

Heading Level 2

Heading Level 3

Heading Level 4

Heading Level 5
Heading Level 6

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Aperiam enim sunt sapiente molestias, sed dicta inventore consectetur beatae asperiores, aliquid laboriosam animi, praesentium repudiandae et, quam saepe sint cupiditate reiciendis.

This is an emphasized text 
<h1>Heading Level 1</h1>
<h2>Heading Level 2</h2>
<h3>Heading Level 3</h3>
<h4>Heading Level 4</h4>
<h5>Heading Level 5</h5>
<h6>Heading Level 6</h6>

<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Aperiam enim sunt sapiente molestias, sed dicta inventore consectetur beatae asperiores, aliquid laboriosam animi, praesentium repudiandae et, quam saepe sint cupiditate reiciendis.</p>

<em>This is an emphasized text</em>

<button class="btn">Submit</button>

Forms

These are notes associated with this form component.

Contact Form inputs

Subscription Form inputs

<h3>Contact Form inputs</h3>

<div style="height: 20px;"></div>

<div class="contactform-input">
	<input class="input" name="name" placeholder="Your Name Here" type="text"></input>
</div>
<div class="contactform-input">
	<input class="input" name="email" placeholder="Your Email Here" type="email"></input>
</div>

<div class="contactform-input">
	<select class="select" name="services">
    <option>User Experience Reviews</option>
    <option>Design Solutions</option>
    <option>Research Solutions</option>
    <option>Team Assistance</option>
    <option>Other</option>
  </select>
</div>
<div class="contactform-input">
	<textarea class="textarea" name="message" placeholder="Is there anything else you'd like us to know?" type="paragraph"></textarea>
</div>

<h3>Subscription Form inputs</h3>

<div style="height: 20px;"></div>

<input type="email" value="" name="EMAIL" class="required email" id="mce-EMAIL" placeholder="Your Email Here">
